articles.title: JAN MOIR: Prince Andrew's silence isn't golden... it just makes him look tarnished - Daily Mail
articles.description: JAN MOIR: What is going on? The feelings of the Queen seem to be the primary concern here, not the trepidations of a young woman who believes herself to have been sex-trafficked.
articles.content: At the top of the Royal Family tree, up there where the air is rarefied, a group of powerful men wring their hands in dismay. Beads of sweat pop on their foreheads. Frown lines furrow and deepen. Eye… [+11918 chars]
